description.@en: There is always some person, place or thing which wholly absorbs me and is my muse to create.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You gain a muse, which may be an object, person or place. When in the presence of your muse, you ignore Peril Condition penalties when creating works of art. You’ll gain new muses at each Tier.
